binding.name: anyshake
binding.description: Receives seismic data from the AnyShake Observer TCP forwarder

parameter.name: address
parameter.description: Address of the TCP forwarder service provided by AnyShake Observer. Format: [host]:[port], e.g., 127.0.0.1:30000

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.description: Connection timeout in seconds when attempting to reach the forwarder endpoint.

parameter.name: sampleRate
parameter.description: Sample rate of the stream received from the AnyShake Observer.

parameter.name: locationCode
parameter.description: Location code of the stream received from the AnyShake Observer.

parameter.name: channelPrefixVelocity
parameter.description: Prefix of the velocity channels received from the AnyShake Observer.

parameter.name: channelPrefixAcceleration
parameter.description: Prefix of the acceleration channels received from the AnyShake Observer.

parameter.name: proc
parameter.description: Name of the proc object (defined in streams.xml); used for processing raw streams (streams submitted by a plugin as raw samples).
